name: Umbrella
description:
"Umbrella" is the result of my observation of the psychological side of the people affected by this war. Many who do not know but become victims, a lot of tears and blood, people who lost hope. This is really very sad, sacrificing many things just for the benefit of which may only be enjoyed by a few people or groups. 

As an artist, I can't do much. I only able to pray and return to the studio to make art. artwork that encapsulates and represents the feelings and emotions of many people, a work that has hope, and may it bring peace.

Umbrella is a artwork with hope that the war will end, conflict can be quelled and no one will be a victim. rain must over and live surrounded by lots of love.

"Why should there be war, if problems can be solved by communication like a friendship"
war must end and live in peace full of love.

Regards,

Montha
